Server

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.QueryBuilder

  • public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides functions for building http query strings for GET and POST actions
    Since:
    2016-03-13
    Author:
    Anthony Botelho

      • GetAirportQuery

        public static java.lang.String GetAirportQuery(java.lang.String team)
        Constructs the parameter list for querying the airports
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP get request

      • GetAirplaneQuery

        public static java.lang.String GetAirplaneQuery(java.lang.String team)
        Constructs the parameter list for querying the airplanes
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP get request

      • GetFlightQuery

        public static java.lang.String GetFlightQuery(java.lang.String team,
                                              java.lang.String airport_code,
                                              java.lang.String departure_date,
                                              boolean departure)
        Constructs the parameter list for querying the flights
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        airport_code - the 3 character aiport code
        departure_date - the date of the flights as a string
        departure - whether the request is for departure or arrival flights
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP get request

      • GetResetQuery

        public static java.lang.String GetResetQuery(java.lang.String team)
        Constructs the parameter list for resetting the database
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP get request (for reset)

      • GetTimezoneQuery

        public static java.lang.String GetTimezoneQuery(java.lang.String team,
                                                double latitude,
                                                double longitude)
        Constructs the parameter list for querying the timezone associated with a coordinate
        Parameters:
        team - the username (project team name) to access the server
        latitude - the latitude of the coordinate
        longitude - the longitude of the coordinate
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP get request

      • GetReserveAction

        public static java.lang.String GetReserveAction(java.lang.String team,
                                                java.lang.String xmlFlights)
        Constructs the parameter list for purchasing a ticket in the database
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        xmlFlights - the xml containing flight and seating information for purchase
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP post action

      • lock

        public static java.lang.String lock(java.lang.String team)
        Constructs the parameter list for locking the database
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP post action

      • unlock

        public static java.lang.String unlock(java.lang.String team)
        Constructs the parameter list for unlocking the database
        Parameters:
        team - the name of the project team
        Returns:
        A string containing the parameters of an HTTP post action
